 Multiply an element of ` _om ` by ` 2o ` (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement: nn2m $p |- ( A e. _om -> ( 2o .o A ) = ( A +o A ) ) $.
